Events

As well as our regular weekly events, Dragon's Dice Gaming club also periodically run larger events on a one-off or semi-regular basis. These events can eithe be free to attend or have ticketed entry depending on the event in question

The Events run by Dragon's Dice Gaming range from open day events designed to showcase a particular game, ongoing narriative campaigns, to competitive tournaments.

In addition, we also periodically run Charity Tournaments, the proceeds of which go do one of the Charities we support. In addition to the event itseld, these Charity Tournaments will feature a Charity Prize Draw to help raise money for the charity in question, with prizes provided by Local Games stores in the area.

If you would like to sign up to any of our events, you can do so through the links on the event in question.

Magic the Gathering - Charity Tournament
Date: 13th-14th September

Dragon's Dice Gaming Club will be running a Magic: the Gathering Tournament, with all the proceeds raised going to Cancer Reasearch UK. Tournament Entry at Â£6 a player, with a discount for existing members.

Learn to Play: Halo Flashpoint
Date: 8th October

Join us for a Introductory event for Halo: Flashpoint. Come and learn the game in a casual gaming evening, or just hang out and play a few games. Dragon's Dice games will have a club owned Starter set for use in Demo Games if you want to give it a try

Join here
No Club this Weekend
Date: 22nd-23rd November

Due to a non-club related event being run at the hall, there will be no Weekend Gaming taking place on this week.

Warhammer 40,000: Winter Assault
Date: 5th-6th December

Join us for a Narrative event for Warhammer 40,000. Fight for control of the Icy world of Helgaard, using a mixture of the Crusade system and our custom house rules to represent the treacherous climate. Open to 12 players, contact us for more details.

Join here
Christmas Break
Date: 22nd December - 4th Janurary 2026

There will be no Club events running for two weeks, for obvious reasons! Have a Merry Christmas and we'll see you in the new Year!

New Year, New Army Challenge
Start: Janurary 2026

Sign up for our New Year, New Army Challenge! Over the course of 6-months build up a new army and play with it in a series of linked events. Get in touch for more details on how to join and what game systems are supported
